MICRO
	c BOOTSTRAP
m00 0000000000011100001100000001001111010111
m01 0000000000011100001100000100000111010111
	c LDA $K
m02 0000000000010100001100010001011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m03 0000000000011100000100000000001111011101 //MDR+0->NOP,MAR
m04 0000000000011100001100000000001110011101 //MDR+0->ACC
m05 0000000000010100001100010001011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m06 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c ADD $K
m07 0000000000010100001100010001011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m08 0000000000011100000100000000001111011101 //MDR+0->NOP,MAR
m09 0000000000010100001100000000001110011101 //MDR+ACC->ACC
m0a 0000000000010100001100010001011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m0b 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c STA $K
m0c 0000000000010100001100010001011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m0d 0000000000011100000100000000001111011101 //MDR+0->NOP,MAR
m0e 0000000000010000000100000000001100011111 //ACC+0->NOP,MWE
m0f 0000000000010100001100010001011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m10 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)

MAPPER
m00 02 LDA $K
m01 07 ADD $K
m02 0c STA $K
MAIN

m00 00
m01 08
m02 01
m03 09
m04 02
m05 0a
m06 f0
m07 ff
m08 03
m09 02
m0a 01
